channel.title: Fil B - Public Hub
channel.description: Recent content on Fil B - Public Hub

item.title: Behind the Scenes
item.description:
As a professional I stand at the intersection of technology and business, specialising in designing, developing and implementing solutions to drive tangible business outcomes. I work with industry-leading enterprises and exceptionally talented individuals to transform technical potential into substantial business value and reshaping entire organisations.

I am deeply committed to continuous learning - for a list of courses and certifications visit Credentials, my Credly profile or LinkedIn. I strongly believe that technology is not a standalone solution in itself, but a component of a broader strategy, that includes its integration within the organisation and enhancing user experience. This belief drives my effort to stay up to date with technological advancements, understand business and market shifts and delve into user experience and technology adoption. Through this blog, I aim to share valuable perspectives and insights across these topics, which also helps me organise my thoughts and deepen my understanding.

item.title: AI Implementation and User Experience
item.description: Many organisations have rushed into “integrating” AI into their processes and products. However the successful integration of AI into existing workflows requires careful planning and an intentional approach. Without this, organisations risking disrupting the user experience, potentially becoming an additional tool that users must manage, rather than genuinely helpful enhancement.

item.title: Embedding AI Into Enterprise
item.description: Embedding AI into enterprise workflows can be a complex and presents several unique challenges, with of them being AI’s non-deterministic nature. Unlike traditional systems that produce predictable, rule-based outputs, AI systems operate with a level of uncertainty and variability. This non-determinism can introduce issues when integrating AI into established workflows. The adoption approach and the leadership team play an important role in successfully adopting AI within the organisation.

item.title: Learning Continuum
item.description:
I am continuously striving to expand my knowledge and skills, acquiring a diverse array of academic qualifications and professional certifications. I view each step in my educational journey not just as a milestone, but a foundation for further growth.

From prestigious universities to industry-leading certifications, the credentials below represent my pursuit and deep commitment to lifelong learning.

Institution Subject
Cornell University AI Strategy, eCornell
MIT Technology and Innovation Acceleration Program, MIT xPro
MIT Digital Transformation: Platform Strategies for Success, MIT Sloan Executive Education
MIT Organisational Design for Digital Transformation, MIT Sloan School of Management
Columbia Business School Digital Strategies for Business: Leading the Next Generation Enterprise
City University of London Risk Management in Banking and Finance
Imperial College MSc In Electrical Engineering, Control Systems

Throughout my career, I have pursued and achieved multiple technical and business certifications, consistently seeking opportunities to expand my skills.

item.title: The Dominant Strategy in Game Theory and AI
item.description: One of the most classic examples of Game Theory is the Prisoner’s Dilemma, which illustrates the conflict between individual rationality and collective rationality. In this article, we will explore what game theory acn teach us about AI adoption and how the dominant strategy may lead to a race to the bottom.

item.title: A.I. = Accelerate Inefficiencies
item.description: AI is transforming the business and technology landscape, promising efficiency, innovation and better decision-making. However, for organisations already struggling with technology-business misalignment, structural and operational inefficiencies and lack of governance, AI will accelerate and amplify these challenges.

item.title: Blending AI and Product Management
item.description: The introduction of AI into product development represents a transformative shift in how products are developed, managed and evolved. AI product phases are integrating into various stages of the product management lifecycle. Successfully aligning and integrating the AI product management phases into product management lifecycle, will accelerate the pace of innovation and introduce new capabilities, but may also introduce new challenges.
